com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures

Class TextureHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.AbstractBlenderHelper
      • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.textures.TextureHelper

  • public class TextureHelper
extends AbstractBlenderHelper
    A class that is used in texture calculations.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextureHelper

        public TextureHelper(java.lang.String blenderVersion,
                     BlenderContext blenderContext)
        This constructor parses the given blender version and stores the result. It creates noise generator and texture generators.
        Parameters:
        blenderVersion - the version read from the blend file
        blenderContext - the blender context

    • Method Detail

      • getTexture

        public com.jme3.texture.Texture getTexture(Structure textureStructure,
                                           Structure mTex,
                                           BlenderContext blenderContext)
                                    throws BlenderFileException
        This class returns a texture read from the file or from packed blender data. The returned texture has the name set to the value of its blender type.
        Parameters:
        textureStructure - texture structure filled with data
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Returns:
        the texture that can be used by JME engine
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - this exception is thrown when the blend file structure is somehow invalid or corrupted

      • loadImageAsTexture

        public com.jme3.texture.Texture loadImageAsTexture(Structure imageStructure,
                                                   int imaflag,
                                                   BlenderContext blenderContext)
                                            throws BlenderFileException
        This class returns a texture read from the file or from packed blender data.
        Parameters:
        imageStructure - image structure filled with data
        imaflag - the image flag
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Returns:
        the texture that can be used by JME engine
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - this exception is thrown when the blend file structure is somehow invalid or corrupted

      • createAffineTransform

        public java.awt.geom.AffineTransform createAffineTransform(com.jme3.math.Vector2f[] source,
                                                           com.jme3.math.Vector2f[] dest,
                                                           int[] sourceSize,
                                                           int[] targetSize)
        This method creates the affine transform that is used to transform a triangle defined by one UV coordinates into a triangle defined by different UV's.
        Parameters:
        source - source UV coordinates
        dest - target UV coordinates
        sourceSize - the width and height of the source image
        targetSize - the width and height of the target image
        Returns:
        affine transform to transform one triangle to another

      • getPixelPosition

        public int getPixelPosition(float pos,
                            int size)
        This method returns the proper pixel position on the image.
        Parameters:
        pos - the relative position (value of range <0, 1> (both inclusive))
        size - the size of the line the pixel lies on (width, heigth or depth)
        Returns:
        the integer index of the pixel on the line of the specified width

      • getSubimage

        public com.jme3.texture.Image getSubimage(com.jme3.texture.Image image,
                                          int minX,
                                          int minY,
                                          int maxX,
                                          int maxY)
        This method returns subimage of the give image. The subimage is constrained by the rectangle coordinates. The source image is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to be subimaged
        minX - minimum X position
        minY - minimum Y position
        maxX - maximum X position
        maxY - maximum Y position
        Returns:
        a part of the given image

      • loadImageFromFile

        protected com.jme3.texture.Texture loadImageFromFile(java.lang.String name,
                                                     int imaflag,
                                                     BlenderContext blenderContext)
        This method loads the textre from outside the blend file using the AssetManager that the blend file was loaded with. It returns a texture with a full assetKey that references the original texture so it later doesn't need to ba packed when the model data is serialized. It searches the AssetManager for the full path if the model file is a relative path and will attempt to truncate the path if it is an absolute file path until the path can be found in the AssetManager. If the texture can not be found, it will issue a load attempt for the initial path anyway so the failed load can be reported by the AssetManagers callback methods for failed assets.
        Parameters:
        name - the path to the image
        imaflag - the image flag
        blenderContext - the blender context
        Returns:
        the loaded image or null if the image cannot be found

      • readTextureData

        public java.util.List<CombinedTexture> readTextureData(Structure structure,
                                                       float[] diffuseColorArray,
                                                       boolean skyTexture)
                                                throws BlenderFileException
        Reads the texture data from the given material or sky structure.
        Parameters:
        structure - the structure of material or sky
        diffuseColorArray - array of diffuse colors
        skyTexture - indicates it we're going to read sky texture or not
        Returns:
        a list of combined textures
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - an exception is thrown when problems with reading the blend file occur
